auth.methodHelp: Choose method: email code or password.
auth.noteExpo: Note: in Expo Go, magic links (deep links) can fail. That's why email access uses a code.
auth.pasteHelp: If the email does not open the app, copy the link from the email and paste it here.

login.passwordMethodTip: Tip: for TestFlight/App Review use a demo account with password (create it in Supabase).
login.otpHint: Paste the code (6-8 digits). If you request another one, only the latest works.

alerts.codeSentMessage: Check your email and enter the code.
alerts.sameEmailRequired: Use the same email you used to request the code.
alerts.pasteCodeHint: Paste the code from the email (usually 6-8 digits).
alerts.invalidOrExpiredCode: Invalid or expired code. If you requested another code, only the latest works.

paste.linkPlaceholder: Paste the full email link here‚Ä¶

errors.invalidUrl: The pasted text does not look like a valid URL. Paste the full link from the email.
errors.tokenMissing: I cannot find 'token' in the link. Paste the full link from the email.
errors.emailRequiredFallback: I could not validate the link directly. Add your email above and try again.
errors.verifyFailed: I could not validate the link. ({{message}})

buen_gasto.title: Value for money
buen_gasto.body: Value for money ratio. A 5 if what you get clearly matches what you pay; a 1 if it feels expensive for what it is.

collarets.title: Heft
collarets.body: The punch of the esmorzaret: size, heartiness and overall satisfaction. A 5 if you leave fully satisfied; a 1 if it falls short.

producto.title: Product
producto.body: Ingredient quality and sandwich execution. A 5 if produce and cooking are excellent; a 1 if weak or industrial.

pan.title: Bread
pan.body: Texture, freshness and bread balance with the filling. A 5 if it adds value; a 1 if it hurts the experience.

cremaet.title: Cremaet
cremaet.body: If you order it: intensity, balance and magic. A 5 if spot on; a 1 if weak or poorly built.

ambiente.title: Atmosphere
ambiente.body: Service, pace, comfort and vibes. A 5 if you'd come back for the experience; a 1 if it pushes you away.
